SELECT pipelineId, pipelineName, buildCauseType, pipelineLabel AS label, buildCauseMessage, pipelineCounter, naturalOrder FROM _stages WHERE pipelineName = #pipelineName# AND naturalOrder < #naturalOrder# AND name = #stageName# AND result = 'Passed' AND latestRun = true ORDER BY naturalOrder DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id as pipelineId, name as pipelineName, buildCauseType, label, buildCauseMessage, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter, pipelines.naturalOrder FROM pipelines WHERE name=#name# AND label=#label# ORDER BY pipelineId DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id as pipelineId, name as pipelineName, buildCauseType, label, buildCauseMessage, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter, pipelines.naturalOrder FROM pipelines WHERE id = #value#

SELECT label FROM pipelines WHERE name = #name# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

sqlMap.select: SELECT pipelines.id as pipelineId, pipelines.name as pipelineName, buildCauseType, label, buildCauseMessage, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter, pipelines.naturalOrder, stages.approvedby as approvedby FROM pipelines INNER JOIN stages ON stages.pipelineId = pipelines.id INNER JOIN builds ON builds.stageId = stages.id WHERE builds.id= #buildId#
SELECT pipelineId, pipelineName, buildCauseType, pipelineLabel AS label, buildCauseMessage, pipelineCounter, naturalOrder FROM _stages WHERE id = #stageId#
SELECT pipelines.id FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #name# AND pipelines.counter in ($counters$)
SELECT pipelines.id FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#

SELECT pipelines.id FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# AND pipelines.id <= (SELECT p.id FROM pipelines p WHERE p.name = #pipelineName# AND p.label = #pipelineLabel#) ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC LIMIT #limit#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT pipelines.id as pipelineId, pipelines.name as pipelineName, buildCauseType, label, buildCauseMessage, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter, pipelines.label as pipelineLabel, pipelines.naturalOrder as naturalOrder, pipelines.comment as pipelineComment, stages.name as stageName,stages.counter as stageCounter, stages.id as stageId, stages.approvedBy as approvedBy, stages.approvalType as approvalType, stages.result as stageResult, stages.latestRun, stages.rerunOfCounter, builds.id as buildId, builds.name as buildName, builds.state as buildState, builds.result as buildResult, builds.scheduledDate as scheduledDate, stages.orderId as orderId FROM pipelines INNER JOIN stages ON stages.pipelineId = pipelines.id AND
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.stageId = stages.id AND builds.ignored != true
sqlMap.select: WHERE pipelines.id >= #from# AND pipelines.id <= #to# AND pipelines.name = #pipelineName# ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC, stages.orderId ASC
WHERE pipelines.id IN ($pipelineIds$) ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC, stages.orderId ASC

WHERE pipelines.id IN ( SELECT * FROM ( (SELECT DISTINCT pmr.pipelineId FROM pipelines INNER JOIN pipelineMaterialRevisions pmr ON pmr.pipelineId = pipelines.id INNER JOIN modifications mod ON mod.id >= pmr.fromRevisionId AND mod.id <= pmr.toRevisionId AND pmr.materialId = mod.materialId LEFT JOIN pipelines upstream on mod.pipelineId = upstream.id WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# AND (LOWER(pipelines.label) LIKE #pattern# OR LOWER(mod.comment) LIKE #pattern# OR LOWER(mod.userName) LIKE #pattern# OR LOWER(mod.revision) LIKE #pattern# OR LOWER(upstream.label) LIKE #pattern# OR LOWER(pipelines.buildCauseMessage) LIKE #pattern#) AND LOWER(pipelines.label) != #rawPattern# ) ) AS temp ORDER BY pipelineId DESC LIMIT #limit# ) ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC, stages.orderId ASC

INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT id FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# AND LOWER(pipelines.label) = #rawPattern# ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC LIMIT #limit# ) AS temp ) as tmp on tmp.id = pipelines.id ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC, stages.orderId ASC
WHERE pipelines.id = #id# ORDER BY stages.orderId ASC

SELECT pipelines.name as pipelineName, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter, pipelines.label as pipelineLabel, stages.name as stageName, stages.counter as stageCounter FROM pipelines INNER JOIN stages ON stages.pipelineId = pipelines.id where pipelines.id= #id# AND stages.name = #stage# AND stages.result = 'Passed' ORDER BY stages.id DESC LIMIT 1

INNER JOIN ( SELECT stages.pipelineId AS id FROM stages WHERE stages.state = 'Building' AND latestRun = true UNION SELECT max(pipelines.id) AS id FROM pipelines GROUP BY pipelines.name ) pipelines_to_show ON pipelines.id = pipelines_to_show.id ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC, stages.orderId ASC
ORDER BY stages.orderId ASC
WHERE pipelines.name = #name# ORDER BY stages.orderId ASC

SELECT pipelineId, pipelineName, buildCauseType, label, buildCauseMessage, pipelineCounter, pipelineLabel, naturalOrder, pipelineComment, stageName, stageCounter, stageId, approvedBy, approvalType, stageResult, buildId, buildName, buildState, buildResult, scheduledDate, orderId, rerunOfCounter FROM (
UNION
INNER JOIN pipelinematerialrevisions on pipelinematerialrevisions.pipelineid=pipelines.id INNER JOIN modifications ON modifications.id = pipelinematerialrevisions.torevisionid AND modifications.revision LIKE #stageLocator# INNER JOIN materials ON materials.id=modifications.materialid AND materials.type = 'DependencyMaterial' AND materials.pipelinename = #pipelineName# ) AS temp ORDER BY orderId ASC

SELECT pipelines.name as pipelineName, pipelines.label as label, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# AND ID IN ( SELECT pipelinematerialrevisions.pipelineid FROM materials INNER JOIN modifications ON materials.id= modifications.materialid AND materials.type = 'DependencyMaterial' AND materials.pipelinename = #dependencyPipelineName# AND modifications.revision LIKE #stageLocator# INNER JOIN pipelinematerialrevisions ON modifications.id = pipelinematerialrevisions.torevisionid ) ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC

SELECT pipelines.name as pipelineName, pipelines.label as label, pipelines.counter as pipelineCounter FROM pipelines WHERE pipelines.name = #pipelineName# AND ID IN ( SELECT pipelinematerialrevisions.pipelineid FROM materials INNER JOIN modifications ON materials.id = modifications.materialid AND materials.id = #materialId# AND modifications.revision = #materialRevision# INNER JOIN pipelinematerialrevisions ON modifications.id = pipelinematerialrevisions.torevisionid ) ORDER BY pipelines.id DESC
